subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text: {{zh-hanzi}} # to hold up with both hands # to [[catch]] # to [[dispel]] # {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[pick up]] # {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[retrieve]], to [[fetch]], to [[get]], to [[bring]] #: {{zh-x|走 去 '''@挈''' 雨傘。|tr=zao2 ke3 '''kiêh8''' hou6 suan3.|Run and '''get''' the umbrella.|MN-T|ref='''1841''', [[w:Author:William Dean|William Dean]], [[s:First Lessons in the Tie-chiw Dialect|First Lessons in the Tie-chiw Dialect]], “[[s:First Lessons in the Tie-chiw Dialect/Words and Phrases|Words and Phrases]]”}} # {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[collect]] # {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[tidy up]] # {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[assemble]] # {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[carry]] #: {{zh-x|只 物 '''@挈''' 去 樓頂。|tr=zi2 muêh8 '''kiêh8''' ke3 lao5 dêng2.|'''Carry''' this upstairs.|MN-T|ref='''1841''', [[w:Author:William Dean|William Dean]], [[s:First Lessons in the Tie-chiw Dialect|First Lessons in the Tie-chiw Dialect]], “[[s:First Lessons in the Tie-chiw Dialect/Words and Phrases|Words and Phrases]]”}}
